title: Stormy Daniels releases sketch of man she says threatened her
text:
Stormy Daniels releases sketch of man she says threatened her 3:22pm EDT - 02:08 
Adult-film actress Stormy Daniels on Tuesday released a sketch of a man she said warned her in 2011 to stop discussing her claims she had a sexual encounter with U.S. President Donald Trump, while her lawyer offered a $100,000 reward for information about the man.   
Adult-film actress Stormy Daniels on Tuesday released a sketch of a man she said warned her in 2011 to stop discussing her claims she had a sexual encounter with U.S. President Donald Trump, while her lawyer offered a $100,000 reward for information about the man.  //reut.rs/2qF8dwV
